room_title: Escape room "The Safe Zone" by The Escape Works in Watertown
room_description: The Zombie Apocalypse has finally happened! You’ve been able to survive on your own, but it sure would be nice to be part of a community again. During your travels, you met up with a small group of survivors, and you’ve arrived at an abandoned military hospital in hopes of finding temporary shelter, supplies and the rumors of a Safe Zone nearby. Warning: abandoned military hospital that is cold in the winter / hot in the summer dress appropriately, plus there are tight spaces, darkness, physical activity, horror, flashing lights and Zombies.
